website_summaries.verdict: Six-cup, bronze-style mug or teacup holder with decorative styling, part of larger collection of same design.
pros: Elegant bronze style mug-holder keeps counter clear and cups easy-to-reach
Rust resistant and can be coordinated with other kitchen accessories in the Scroll Collection by Home Basics.Chrome and black finishes are also available
cons: Well-liked item, although it can become unstable and may tip over if extra-large mugs are hung on it

website_summaries.verdict: Its simplistic beautiful design takes up little space and holds up to 6 mugs.
pros: Sleek, bronze-coated steel with swirl design looks chic on any counter top
It’s spacious enough to accommodate most cup sizes
Well made and is the perfect addition to a home coffee bar
cons: Will not double as a drying rack for cups as they hang at an angle
Some branches may bend over time

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY What I Needed; Impressed with the Quality of Construction.  Perfect for Me!
customer_reviews.text: I read a LOT of reviews on various mug trees before deciding on this one. It's just what I wanted: sturdy, nicely made, great finish, and looks great without taking up too much space. If needed, it would even fit under my kitchen cabinets (but I like having it on the outside edge of the countertop). VERY useful & it looks great; the picture doesn't do it justice. I've just posted a photo, so you can see it in a "Real World" setting. Love it; highly recommended for its quality AND the terrific price. Very happy! P.S. I added stick-on felt pads to the bottom of each foot. Keeps it quiet & protects my countertop.
customer_reviews.author: OK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Balance
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy coffee mug tree!! I was impressed with its stability. Most mug trees fall over if there are too many mugs on one side or when you remove a mug for use and it interrupts the balance but this is not the case with this tree. As soon as I recieved it I placed all mugs on one side to make sure it would stay balanced and not tip over and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice on the counter...
customer_reviews.text: I love this mug tree. I have a ridiculous amount of coffee mugs and wanted to display the more colorful mugs in my collection (I also ran out of cabinet space...). As you can see in the photo, I have mugs of varying shapes and sizes hanging from the 'limbs.' It's an adorable mug tree and it does not take up too much space on the counter. So far it has proven to be rather sturdy; however, it is rather static as I do not put these particular mugs to use very often.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I bought some mugs off amazon that are pretty big (and colorful) and I wanted to showcase them but wanted something functional (that helps with space) and this does the trick. I usually stack mugs, near my coffee pot, but that looks disorganized and sloppy. This helps showcase the mugs and make it look nice and neat. I recommend. I ordered these colorful mugs. Theyre pretty big and this stand worked well for them.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen counter
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this, I have larger mugs and they all fit perfectly. The mug tree is very sturdy, well made and has a really pretty high quality looking design. It also doesn't take up very much space on my counter top and freed up some space in my cabinets. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey MacDowell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This cup rack is sturdy enough to hold one cup without tipping over. The upper 4 hooks hold my larger mugs. The 2 bottom hooks hold my small - medium mugs. I have a small kitchen and not much counter space or cabinet space. This gives me more room in both areas. Looks great on my counter. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Best Product, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this purchase! I have looked all over and could never find one I like and one that was under $30. I love the color and style, goes nicely with our kitchen and does a great job holding all sizes of mugs, it also hides the outlet that our keurig is plugged in too so I am pleased with that. It is a very sturdy product and I am not worried about the cups falling off. For a great price, I would recommend buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kassara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for few mugs.  Arrived damaged/be t
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want a big bulky mug holder as only my kid and hubby use mugs every once in while and I don’t have a lot of mugs. This arrived bent (tower part). Was unable to bend back so it’s crooked . Liked it overall, have to keep one sided to hide the crooked side.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stanley

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty cheap so I can't complain too much
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cheap so I can't complain too much, but I have two of these and the bottom hooks don't fit normal sized mugs. They usually just roll of and make a mess on the counter after I've let them sit for long enough. The rods are also too thick to try and bend them in order to make it work a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Chase K.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The cup tree arrived on time and was in perfect condition. It is sized perfectly and looks good in my kitchen and does what it is for. My daughter liked it so much I will probably have to order her one. The only issue is that it is not quite level, off just enough that I need to keep a piece of card stock under one of the feet to keep it from rocking (like a table not quite level) which is not a big issue for me. Much easier than keeping my cups in my over filled cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic and looks cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my roommate who drinks coffee many times a day and was running out of room in her mug cabinet. She loved it and uses it to display all of her mugs in the kitchen area. She has some mugs that are really heavy and this mug tree is very well balanced. The heavy mugs never cause a weight problem and it has never fallen over. It looks very nice in our kitchen and has never given us any problems. Great buy to save space in cabinets and show off your mugs to visiters.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: We have coffee every morning and before I purchased the mug tree, we would put our mugs on the counter for the next morning by the coffee pot. That way the mugs were right there, ready to be used. The mug tree classes it up and, now, I hang four mugs by the coffee pot to have that first, very needed cup of coffee each morning. It, also, frees up counter space by hanging them on the tree instead of the counter. If we have company, there mugs are there as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The seller service was great, however I was a little disappointed in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The seller service was great, however I was a little disappointed in the mug tree. It is not heavy enough to hold 6-11oz coffee mugs. It's fine when all the mugs are on the tree but when you start taking the mugs off it falls over. I remove the mugs from the top first and work my way down. So far I haven't broke any mugs. I just purchased them and would be upset if they broke while taking a mug off the tree. Wasn't worth the hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a defective holder - disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a while ago. The unit was defective and was missing a 3rd double hook - had to return
customer_reviews.author: Denise B. Mikkelsen

customer_reviews.title: It is cheap but has good design and condition
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap but has good design and condition. It can keep 6 cups, so I am glad to organize more easily. And shipment was very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, Smaller Space on Bottom Tier
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and it looks nice, but I bought it for a specific set of mugs and while the mugs hang nicely from the top two tiers, they are a little big for the bottom one and just sort of rest on the bottom. It still works and looks okay, but the bottom two mugs aren't very secure or steady. The mugs I have are rather large and probably hold around 16oz.
customer_reviews.author: ARRE

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Mine came with one of the little knobs attached to them bottom a little wonky but it works. I like the design and the color. I have various mugs on them, different sizes and they fit well.. I do feel you have to be a little careful when placing the mugs or cups on it as you might knock it down...but that may be only because mine wasn't 100% symmetrical enough. But other than that, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good with a small flaw
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and it even holds some of my bigger mugs (they are going to be touching one another so you need to be careful when putting them on and off). The only complaint I have is that one of its legs is a little shorter than others (I think I saw that mentioned in other reviews). Not enough to tip over but enough to make it annoying (it's easy to fix by gluing something to the shorter leg to make them even). It is well-made otherwise. The shorter leg problem needs to be addressed by the manufacturer, though.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Solid and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a mug tree for large mugs. My large mugs fill this to the max, and I have to arrange them carefully. That said, I can get all 6 mugs on it safely, so it does the job! I like the looks of it and it is solid. Nice addition to my kitchen and it saves counter space from how I had my mugs set up before.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these after reading the reviews. The comments were spot on. I have large size cups in them. They are stable. The little wobble because they don't sit quite level is not an issue and the weight of the cups is enough to keep the stand from wobbling. They are a nice color and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie D.

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea and I use it, but it’s just a little small for my mugs. It works, but just 1/2 cm taller would have improved the design considerably.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift. When they opened it, the top portion come off from a weak weld I assume. When I looked to return it, it was past the time for return. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Fits My Large Coffee Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Great item! The bronze color is great -- the size is great. I was worried because I was trying to find a coffee tree that would fit my coffee mugs from Pier1. They were a little large and other coffee tree arms weren't big enough for them. This one fit them fine.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I think I just received a deffective tree...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as an accent piece for my in-home coffee bar. I really liked the metal scroll work and general design. However, when it arrived the middle branch was bent at an odd angle (it looks like it was not soldered on correctly) and any mug placed on it falls off. Other than that, this mug tree is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Hegna

customer_reviews.title: nice tree mug
customer_reviews.text: Holds your coffee mugs well. Looks good in your kitchen. Takes up very little room. Get it for your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: joseph butterworth

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed! I was able to fit 2 of my bigger cups on the top and the rest with my smaller ones. I actually think I could add more of my bigger cups and the stand wouldn't fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Pandorica

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly under my cabinet and holds different sizes easily. I'm using it at the holidays to display my Christmas mugs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Mug Tree, But Not For Very Large Mugs
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mug/cup holder. It would work well with most mugs, except larger mugs that hold more ounces. I used this for 16 oz. mugs that have a roundish shape to them. The bottom ones touch. However, it is a nice mug tree! Nice and sturdy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Thammbone

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Bar!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect height, width (with cups) and size for my coffee bar. I purchased a different brand from a local store and it was too wide and flimsy; this is sturdy and fits in woth the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie Pie

customer_reviews.title: Came broken, missing one foot. By the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Came broken, missing one foot. By the time I took it out of the box, it was too late to return. Propped a piece of heavily folded, heavy duty aluminum foil underneath as support.
customer_reviews.author: BrinaBaby

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I can hang 4 mugs comfortably on this rack. It's very sturdy and I would highly recomend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jenevieve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to add to our coffee bar and it looks beautiful! It arrived just as pictured and functions as it should. I was kind of worried that my mugs weren't going to fit, because I have a lot of over sized mugs, however, they all fit just fine with no issues. The metal is very sturdy, and so are the bars that hold each of the mugs. I would absolutely purchase this again, or even consider it as a gift for my fellow coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confused customer with incsorrect information
customer_reviews.text: Seller advertised this product as the twin size. When I called, the Amazon operator said twin size had no difference than the single size and the difference was only the color. I interpreted the twin size as 2 units and the single as 1 unit. I told the Amazon operator, seller had the color in a separate line already and why they confused the customers. I returned the unit.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mug tree! It is gorgeous and makes room in my limited cabinet space. When we have guests over they can grab a cup of coffee in the mornings without having to look through the cabinets. Beautiful on my coffee bar! I've had many compliments. I promise You won't be sorry you bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: I like this coffee cup stand
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my countertop clean and doesn't take up all the space that the coffee cups would have in my cabinet coffee cups from the most used Cup in my home so I keep them next to the coffee pot looks good good quality no complaints fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Coolest_Grandma_Ever

customer_reviews.title: Best Mug Tree
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy for the load of mugs I set on this thing. Nicely holds even my Starbucks City mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jinnie L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great on the counter
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and looks great on the counter! The only downside is that it wasn't packaged very well, it was just tossed in a box, no bubble wrap/foam. One of the hooks sticking out for mugs was sticking out of the box when it arrived. Luckily mine was not damaged but I imagine it would be easy for one to arrive broken that way.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Just What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy with lots of room for 6 cups. The bronze went great with my bronze pink salt lamp light.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my new coffee bar and love it! It looks beautiful and I'm so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice mug holder and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mug tree. It matches all the other bronze in my kitchen and very sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: MissyB

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee tree.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee mug tree gets the job done. It holds the mugs with no problem I dont have to worry about it tipping over if the weight isn't balanced. I took one star away because one of the top bars was bent downwards when I received it and I had to reshape it to hold a cup there. Other than that I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great size, cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, sturdy mug rack! Holds my large starbucks mugs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Cute Mug Tree
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mug tree to place our favorite Starbucks cups on. Note that we have the normal size Starbucks cups which are more like mugs and not the real tall cups they also sell. Our mug tree sits right beside our one cup coffee maker and does it's job wonderfully. Holds the mugs with enough room between them so they don't touch one another and thereby cause any breakage, is very sturdy and doesn't take up to much countertop room. Pretty darn cute too. All in all a great mug tree and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaMom49

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup holder! I didn't want a big chunky wooden one. This matches my paper towel and napkin holders. It's well balanced, never tips when a cup is removed. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O.

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better but worked out in the end.
customer_reviews.text: We liked the size and styling but be aware that the quality could be higher. The first one we got was missing the middle set of pegs so we sent it back and ordered a new one. The second one arrived with all pegs but the top set was bent down so the cups would fall off. I bent the up by hand and now we are happy. If we wouldn't have sent the other back or do the bending this would have gotten 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Supreme Overlord of the Earth (aka Jon)

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mug tree with one disappointing problem
customer_reviews.text: This is decent mug tree. It is really cute but the two bottom prongs hold the mugs weird. I tend to avoid putting mugs on the bottom prongs because they barely hang on there and I am fearful that they will roll of an break. If the height of the bottom prongs (and subsequently the other prongs) this would be a perfect mug tree!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: I was really excited about this mug tree but like some of the other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this mug tree but like some of the other reviewers, it came with one of the bottom stabilizing pieces missing--not broken off during shipping, just completely missing!--so I returned it. It didn't seem extremely sturdy to me and I purchased a different one that seems like it will hold up better. The second star in my rating is because the return was really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lou Engle

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: So Cute! Just a little wobbly but I may have received a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI R JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: It works well and my mugs stay safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a year ago to keep my mugs. It has lasted without any visible wear. Pros: - It holds mugs even when they're a bit above average size. - It looks nice (even though it lives next to the sink, water hasn't damaged it, as far as I can tell) - The arms are slanted upward so I'm less afraid the mugs are going to slip off. Cons: - None that I can see. It works well and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: syntaxactics

customer_reviews.title: Simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple,nothing fancy. Holds about 4 average sized mugs,no over sized ones. Ended up having to buy another rack after this because of that
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted <3 It's great quality and perfect size. I really do recommend this :)
customer_reviews.author: Djslice

customer_reviews.title: Holds up pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a while . Wanted to write a review after seeing how this holds up . It's pretty good . I have used all slots . Hanged mugs which are quite heavy as well . The stand doesn't topple or wobble . Stands intact .good buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: siddharth

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice and functions well
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and functions well. I bought one for home and one for office. Doesn't work with oversized or large mugs. Normal or small mugs only. But I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They are so cute.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of mugs that I needed someplace to store. I ordered two of these trees. My mugs fit great, even some that are bigger than normal. I used all of the rungs so I've got 6 mugs on each tree. They're sturdy and quite pretty. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: carole anderson

customer_reviews.title: I did like the look
customer_reviews.text: One arm on the mug was welded on crooked, and wouldn't hold any size, type mug. Returned it for a refund. Wasn't given the option of requesting a replacement instead. Haven't reordered. Thinking about it; I did like the look, and it would accommodate my mugs, (only five on the one I received), but I'm not willing to risk getting another defective one. No quality control.
customer_reviews.author: AZ hiker

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I love this little tree and it looks great. Only reason I didn't do 5 stars is because it is pretty little. It's hard to fit as many coffee mugs as I had expected but I still really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mug tree
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mug tree, and I like that it fits 6 mugs, not just 4! The large mugs bump into the other mugs on this tree, but I solved the problem by repositioning.
customer_reviews.author: E. Young

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing spectacular but for my needs I should really give it a 5. Just wanted something on my counter to hold odd mugs to save room I'm the cupboard. Most of the mugs are oversized but it works great. Can't beat the price and free delivery.
customer_reviews.author: bayshore

customer_reviews.title: Alternate use got mug tree.
customer_reviews.text: Using this product to hang ornaments after they are varnished to allow them to dry. I will be able to process 6 at one time. Will still have use of it for hanging mugs or cups afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Serita Beck

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for, not so bad.
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough, very practical, if you have a set of the same mugs you want to show off. However, the product stands on four metal balls, when I pulled it out of the packaging one of the metal balls is missing. I'm practical so I just folded a coaster, and used that as a counter-weight so it wouldn't wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten

customer_reviews.title: very practical
customer_reviews.text: I put next to my personal coffeemaker. I put 4 mugs and stacked 5 K-Cups on the bottom. Very handy for my quick use in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cups at my finger tips
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as pictured and looks great on my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This mug tree is just awesome. I doesn't take up too much room on my counter and it looks so nice. I love the color and design. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mel&Rick

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great mug tree very pretty and very well made. Doesn't take up much space (on an already crowded counter) on it's own. For the money I couldn't have asked for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Kisting

customer_reviews.title: Handy item.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Big enough for large mugs (not the super large) and does not tip over. Coffee mugs take up a lot of room in my cupboard and this mug tree has freed a lot of space in my shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ran out of room in the cupboard so this is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of room in the cupboard so this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly under my cabinets and next to the Keurig. It holds 4 mugs.
customer_reviews.author: RV Living

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking Wish it was a little STURDIER great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking Wish it was a little STURDIER great for light weight cups A little unsteady for heavier mugs I like them (ordered two)
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Gets me my morning coffee about 3 seconds faster... : )
customer_reviews.text: My wife keeps this by our coffee maker and it really looks nice. She is the "decorator" in our house and she loves how it looks on our counter. It does a good job of staying balanced, though you need to try to equally distribute the weight of the mugs that hang on it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ziebro

customer_reviews.title: Works very nicely with the 4 tall coffee cups I just bought
customer_reviews.text: Works very nicely with the 4 tall coffee cups I just bought. This does have 6 places for cups... the 4 tall ones work just fine. I don't need the other two so this is perfect for me. If I had 6 tall mugs then it probably wouldn't work. But for 4 it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: This arrived leaning worse that the Leaning Tower of Pisa
customer_reviews.text: This arrived leaning worse that the Leaning Tower of Pisa. I was going to send it back but a strong man here figured out if he put a foot on the base (or maybe it was both feet) he could bend it back upright. Other than that it is fine, so do not worry if arrives leaning to one side about 25 degrees. It will bend back with the right leverage.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Maurer

customer_reviews.title: HOME BASICS SCROLL COLLECTION MUG TREE
customer_reviews.text: I love my mug tree. Its sturdy and holds even the 22 inch mugs on the top tier! If I need more, I will order this particular mug tree again!
customer_reviews.author: Mira Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with this mug tree. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne S.

customer_reviews.title: Great item....
customer_reviews.text: I have bad arthritis and have problems reaching for a coffee mug in the morning from my wall cabinet about the sink. This mug tree is a life saver. It holds a lot of mugs. It looks very nice. I highly recommend it especially for seniors.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tene

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Look...BUT I ordered 2 of these and both look like the Leaning Tower of Pisa! I was able to bend them somewhat straighter to hold my light weight cups. I would not trust them with my heavy mugs.
customer_reviews.author: kanopolislady

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Nice mug tree. Cheap, study, pretty, and functional. Holds six "regular" sized mugs with ease. Perfect if you have a set of four Corelle mugs and two other tiny mugs, like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: love my mug tree
customer_reviews.text: love it. i bought it display my seasonal mugs. i can fit 6 mugs on here no problem. it's just trickier putting the mugs on the bottom 2 hooks. the mugs need to be smaller or have shorter handles. i have 6 different mugs on mine and they hold up no problem and I'm not worried it will tip over. looks grey next to kuerig
customer_reviews.author: K. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scratched and damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product did not look worthy of such high ratings but the larger issue was that there were scratches all over it down to the metal under the finish. The scratches were not in areas that could have been damaged by the shipping. Sending this one back.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This mug tree is very sturdy and visually appealing
customer_reviews.text: I have six Christmas mugs and didn't have mug tree to display them. This mug tree is very sturdy and visually appealing. Would recommend for kitchen counter displaying of mugs.
customer_reviews.author: The Laughing Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Great mug tree.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking mug tree. We bought two of them for our copper "Mule" mugs, and they look great with the wrought iron tree. Given the price, you really can't lose. Check measurements if you want them to fit under a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C. Monson

customer_reviews.title: great mug tree!
customer_reviews.text: We love our mug tree! It looks great on the coffee table at the office and our mugs are not all over on the table now. Thanks for a great product! It stands straight and does not teeter totter. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: Waste if money. Cheap and arrived bent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product recently and it arrived bent. It is very flimsy and must have been damaged during shipping. When I tried to straighten it to make it level one of the arms broke off. Many reviews looked good on this product, maybe mine was just faulty?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica White

customer_reviews.title: Warped
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived bent, at first I thought well maybe it’s supposed to be that way .. ya know to angle the glasses but as I referred back to the ad, thats not the case. Also, be very carefull placing glasses on rack, they are not speaced far away so they will hit and could possibly chip.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Norris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Fits well in my kitchen and holds 6 medium to large mugs.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I didn't need more cup storage but I wanted to display my cute chicken cups :)
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and useful..
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and useful ...I'm enjoying my mug tree. It's roomy enough for very large mugs, small enough not to take up too much room on My counter and very handy. Now I have more space in my cabinet for other stuff. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: erodrod

customer_reviews.title: Love it but the post leans a little and not ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it but the post leans a little and not straight up. I kept it but knocked a star. To much trouble to return. Otherwise I am pleased. Very sturdy and needs very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tree
customer_reviews.text: Nice tree that works perfectly in our kitchen with our coffee theme. It helped also to free up some space in our cabinets since we were able to move some of our cups to the tree. Buyer should just be aware though that larger coffee cups may be too big for the bottom hooks. I have tried to place our oversized cups on the bottom and they scrape the bottom of the tree or won't fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and sturdy. Apparently I ordered some oversized mugs, but I hung them on different hooks carefully and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Metz

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product and I am happy I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and I am happy I bought it from amazon. It saves so much space in my kitchen and it is very sturdy and stable. I bought two pieces and am using them to hang heavy mugs and its still very stable. At this price I think its a very good product. The delivery was on time and the packaging was good.Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bronze option of this mug tree and I am delighted with it! It's quite sturdy, well balanced on the counter and a lovely design. You can't go wrong for the price either :) Thinking of getting a second one and the matching paper towel holder to dress up my counters even more! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Saks1962

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mug tree to hold my Christmas mugs, of which I have several. I was pleased with the appearance and function of the mug tree, especially for the very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a six count recipe mug set I'd ordered prior from from a home shopping network. Looks great on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great product- looks nice and does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Mom2jwn

customer_reviews.title: STURDY MUG HOLDER!
customer_reviews.text: I had been on the lookout for a mug holder that was sturdy and would fit my big mugs. I decided to try this and boy o boy was I impressed. I love this holder and can fit a huge amount of my coffee mugs. I have had it for awhile and am so happy I purchased this. I love it. This has been sturdy and held up quite nicely. This doesn't tip over either so great.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Holds 6 when most only hold 4 cups. Nice quality and design. From the reviews I thought it wold be heavier, but I noticed it got a lot heavier when I hung six ceremic cups from it. It's not going to fall over when full.
customer_reviews.author: Old EnglishMajor

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very sturdy. Holds 6 16oz cappuccino mugs easily.
customer_reviews.author: ECG

customer_reviews.title: Like it. It matches the Coffee Mug Storage basket ...
customer_reviews.text: Like it. It matches the Coffee Mug Storage basket I got. Can only hold 4 cups because the size of cups today are too big for the bottom hangers. But otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie L.

customer_reviews.title: It holds coffee mugs
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my counter and use it for your average sized coffee mugs. It does not have a 'top heavy' problem, the balance is stable so I have no problem displaying some of my more decorative mug sets on it. Makes a nice, useful accent to the kitchen coffee area.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Vivigatz

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This mug rack has improved my kitchen SO much! I have limited cabinet space & the elegant iron design of this rack looks gorgeous on my counter top. It's very sturdy, and does its job well. Definitely happy with this purchase & would recommend to a friend or family member!
customer_reviews.author: Sara
